title: Five-Star Cascais Oceanfront Oasis on Portugal's Atlantic Coast
description: Escape to Portugal's romantic Atlantic, with a luxurious stay at the Intercontinental Cascais Estoril, an IHG Hotel. Beautifully located on this seaside town's stretch of golden sand, the hotel positions you perfectly for meandering the cobblestone laneways or basking on the beach. After days of exploring, partake in an indulgent couples' massage at the spa, or enjoy a cocktail and cheese platter with panoramic views of Cascais Bay at the Bago Du Vin Gourmet Bar and Terrace.
location_description: Intercontinental Cascais Estoril, an IHG Hotel
